name: Endangered Mentality
description:
Endangered Mentality

Take on the role of a high school student who just doesn't fit in. High school is just not for them and everyone else agrees. Every human figure you see is a "blurry" image and the words they speak are dark and negative. However, there are parts of the school that have a positive aspect to them. In specific rooms or areas, there are many different types of animals that have different traits. They help give confidence and self-esteem by talking and giving advice. These animals become your only friends, stabilizing your mental health and creating a better high school experience.

~

Use the arrow keys to move and interact. Use the space bar to read through passages.

~

Team: 

Ixel Camacho - Art & Design

Vincent Bouyssounouse - Art
